snippet: Massive Open Online Courses are free, non-degree programs that have been drawing top professors. Some educators see a future in which alternative forms of credentials will be widely accepted by employers.
abstract: Massive Open Online Courses are free, non-degree programs that have been drawing top professors. Some educators see a future in which alternative forms of credentials will be widely accepted by employers.

headline.main: Large Online Courses, Open to All, Knock Down Campus Walls
